description: Returns the details of an asynchronous baseline operation, as initiated by any of these APIs: EnableBaseline, DisableBaseline, UpdateEnabledBaseline, ResetEnabledBaseline. A status message is displayed in case of operation failure. For usage examples, see the Amazon Web Services Control Tower User Guide.

parameters.name: operationIdentifier
parameters.description: The operation ID returned from mutating asynchronous APIs (Enable, Disable, Update, Reset).

nested_items.name: baselineOperation
nested_items.description: A baselineOperation object that shows information about the specified operation ID.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the operation (if applicable), in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: operationIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the specified operation.

nested_items.name: operationType
nested_items.description: An enumerated type ( enum) with possible values of ENABLE_BASELINE, DISABLE_BASELINE, UPDATE_ENABLED_BASELINE, or RESET_ENABLED_BASELINE.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the operation, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: An enumerated type ( enum) with possible values of SUCCEEDED, FAILED, or IN_PROGRESS.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A status message that gives more information about the operation's status, if applicable.
